name: GridCellSelectionApi
description: The cell selection API interface that is available in the grid apiRef.

properties.name: unstable_getCellSelectionModel
properties.description:
Returns an object containing the selection state of the cells.
The keys of the object correpond to the row IDs.
The value of each key is another object whose keys are the fields and values are the selection state.

properties.name: unstable_getSelectedCellsAsArray
properties.description:
Returns an array containg only the selected cells.
Each item is an object with the ID and field of the cell.

properties.name: unstable_isCellSelected
properties.description: Determines if a cell is selected or not.

properties.name: unstable_selectCellRange
properties.description: Selects all cells that are inside the range given by start and end coordinates.
properties.type: (start: GridCellCoordinates, end: GridCellCoordinates, keepOtherSelected?: boolean) => void

properties.name: unstable_setCellSelectionModel
properties.description: Updates the selected cells to be those passed to the newModel argument. Any cell already selected will be unselected.
